ygData.messageBody:
>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Specialization skill -- NEWS
>Date: Wed, 05 May 1999 22:04:51 +0200

>Vampiric Embrace (Necromancer and Shadow Knight) Once cast, this >spell
>gives you a chance of draining HP from your target every time >you attack.
>Formally, this spell added to your attack roll.

any fellow necros out there know if this is still a hand-to-hand spell?
